H0.text: what did james chadwick invent. Proton Accelerator

H1.text: what did james chadwick invent. Geiger Counter

H2.text: what did james chadwick invent. Cyclotron

H3.text: what did james chadwick invent. Neutron

A4.text: The neutron was discovered by James Chadwick in 1932.

A5.text: In 1935, Chadwick and his doctoral student Maurice Goldhaber reported the first accurate measurement of the mass of the neutron.
